name: Elderfact
description:
Description

Guided by the village's elder, a young wizard takes to the tower of curses to retrieve an ancient artifact to save the village. 

Use the three elements: Fire, teleportation, and necromancy to clear challenging puzzles and defeat the evils of the tower.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move.

R to restart the current room.

Control + R to restart the game.

Space to forward dialogue and menus.

1, 2, 3 to choose an element.

Left mouse button to select a target.

Right mouse button to cancel selection

Credits

Visuals: Quale and me.

SFX: Beep Yeah!, Harvey656 and Labbed.

Music: Chippy01302 and Tallbeard Studios.
